addHeaders(bytes,bytes).details: Checks integrity and consistency of the header chain

params._anchor: The header immediately preceeding the new chain
params._headers: A tightly-packed list of 80-byte Bitcoin headers

returns._0: True if successfully written, error otherwise

addHeadersWithRetarget(bytes,bytes,bytes.details: Checks the retarget, the heights, and the linkage

params._headers: A tightly-packed list of 80-byte Bitcoin headers
params._oldPeriodEndHeader: The last header in the difficulty period being closed (anchor of new headers)
params._oldPeriodStartHeader: The first header in the difficulty period being closed

returns._0: True if successfully written, error otherwise

checkTxProof(bytes32,uint256,bytes,uint2.details: Checks if the block is finalized, and Merkle proof is valid

params._index: of the tx in Merkle tree
params._intermediateNodes: Part of the Merkle tree from the tx to the root in LE form (called Merkle proof)
params._txid: Desired tx Id in LE form

returns._0: True if the provided tx is confirmed on Bitcoin

findHeight(bytes32).details: Fails if the header is unknown

params._hash: The header hash to search for

params._index: of the desired block header in that height

getBlockHeaderHash(uint256,uint256).details: It cannot be called by other contracts

params._index: of the desired block header in that height

getBlockHeaderHashContract(uint256,uint2.details: Caller should pay the query fee

getNumberOfSubmittedHeaders(uint256).details: This shows the number of temporary forks in that specific height

params._height: The desired height of the blockchain

returns._0: Number of block headers stored in a height

params._TeleportDAOToken: The address of the TeleportDAO ERC20 token contract
params._periodStart: The hash of the first header in the genesis epoch

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseRelay().details: Only functions with whenPaused modifier can be called

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._baseQueries: The base number of queries we assume in each epoch                     This prevents query fee to grow significantly

params._epochLength: The length of epochs used for estimating the query fee

setFinalizationParameter(uint256).details: Bigger finalization parameter increases security but also increases the delay

setRelayerPercentageFee(uint256).details: A percentage of the submission gas used goes to Relayers as reward

setRewardAmountInTDT(uint256).details: This award is for the Relayer who submitted a finalized block header

params._rewardAmountInTDT: The amount of reward in TDT

params._submissionGasUsed: The gas used by Relayers for submitting a block header

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpauseRelay().details: Only functions with whenNotPaused modifier can be called

BlockAdded(uint256,bytes32,bytes32,addre.notice: Emits when a block header is added

BlockFinalized(uint256,bytes32,bytes32,a.notice: Emits when a block header gets finalized

NewQuery(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Emits when inclusion of a tx is queried

addHeaders(bytes,bytes).notice: Adds headers to storage after validating

addHeadersWithRetarget(bytes,bytes,bytes.notice: Adds headers to storage, performs additional validation of retarget

availableTDT().notice: Getter for available TDT in Relay treasury

availableTNT().notice: Getter for available target native token (TNT) in Relay treasury

checkTxProof(bytes32,uint256,bytes,uint2.notice: Checks if a tx is included and finalized on Bitcoin

findHeight(bytes32).notice: Finds the height of a header by its hash

getBlockHeaderFee(uint256,uint256).notice: Getter for a specific block header submission gas price

getBlockHeaderHash(uint256,uint256).notice: Getter for a specific block header's hash in the stored chain

getBlockHeaderHashContract(uint256,uint2.notice: Same as getBlockHeaderHash, but can be called by other contracts

getNumberOfSubmittedHeaders(uint256).notice: Getter for the number of submitted block headers in a height

initialize(bytes,uint256,bytes32,address.notice: Gives a starting point for the relay

ownerAddHeaders(bytes,bytes).notice: Same as addHeaders, but can only be called by owner even if contract is paused         It will be used if a fork happend

ownerAddHeadersWithRetarget(bytes,bytes,.notice: Same as addHeadersWithRetarget, but can only be called by owner even if contract is paused         It will be used if a fork happend
